title: Light and bright townhome with amazing views!
posting_body: Marin Headlands Sausalito:
Large newly remodeled unfurnished townhome in Sausalito with incredible views near open space hiking trails.

There is a designated covered parking space for you just steps from your front door (as well as guest parking and ample street parking for a second car) in this hilltop neighborhood and well maintained two story Headlands II townhome.
Large primary bedroom and second bedroom downstairs, each with en suite bathrooms, large deck and huge wall to wall closets.
Living, Dining, Kitchen, Deck and 1/2 bath are upstairs.
Hiking trails are steps away.
The condo is newly remodeled and furnished with all new bathroom vanities, floors and new appliances.
Very safe and quiet.
Available September 1.
Since we have current tenants, we will show on Saturday, August 6th between 10am-12pm.
Please write back for an appointment.
Easy commute to the city!
With gorgeous views of Mt. Tamalpais and Mill Valley, this light, bright condo is large, peaceful, clean and quiet.
$5100/month.
First/Last/$5100 security
Owner pays for water, recycling, garbage and homeowner association fees.
Renters pay for electricity and internet.
No smoking.
Available unfurnished.
Small dog or cat ok with Pet deposit of $1500.
